data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Phan, Quoc Toan, To, Van Quang, Payra, Arajush (2019): First record of Indolestes cyaneus (Selys, 1862) from Vietnam and notes on its color variation (Odonata: Zygoptera: Lestidae). Zootaxa 4571 (3): 409-416, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4571.3.8|7 occurrences
